hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PERF_URLS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: List of monitoring URLs. Whitespace separated.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "{}" > package.json [ -e node_modules ] || npm install phantomas

#!/bin/bash
URLS="$PERF_URLS"
RESULT_DIR="results/$BUILD_NUMBER"
echo """
URLs: $URLS
JSON Configuration:
$JSON_CONFIG
"""
./node_modules/.bin/phantomas --help
echo "$JSON_CONFIG" > config.json
for url in $URLS; do
# Define URL key for I/O and Metric keys ยง URL_KEY=$(node -pe "process.argv.slice(1)[0].replace(/(^https?:\/\/)|(\/$)/g, '').replace(/(\/|\?|-|&|=|\.)/g, '_')" $url); URL_DIR=$RESULT_DIR/$URL_KEY
echo """
URL - $url Key - $URL_KEY Dir - $URL_DIR
"""
mkdir -p $URL_DIR
# echoing to user echo ./node_modules/.bin/phantomas $url \ --reporter json \ --config ./config.json \ --screenshot $URL_DIR/screenshot.png \ --screenshot $URL_DIR/screenshot.png \ --har $URL_DIR/har.json \ --film-strip --film-strip-dir $URL_DIR/filmstrip \ --verbose
echo ""
# actual run ./node_modules/.bin/phantomas $url \ --reporter json \ --config ./config.json \ --screenshot $URL_DIR/screenshot.png \ --screenshot $URL_DIR/screenshot.png \ --har $URL_DIR/har.json \ --film-strip --film-strip-dir $URL_DIR/filmstrip \ --verbose \ > $URL_DIR/build.json
cat $URL_DIR/build.json echo "" done
rm config.json
